comments.comments_text: That was really pointless! Sven Kums (Anderlecht) made a mindless challenge and the referee Paolo Tagliavento showed him a red card.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: That was really pointless! [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) made a mindless challenge and the referee [REFEREE] showed him a red card.

comments.comments_text: Franck Ribery (Bayern Munich) attempts to discuss the decision with Paolo Tagliavento, but he soon realises that it's not the right thing to do as he sees the yellow.
